String.string: The Valkyon Federation sends the attached gift in recognition of your victory in the battleground.
The Valkyon Federation sends the attached gift in celebration of your efforts on the battleground.
Your contribution in taking down the dracoloth sovereign did not go unnoticed. Please accept this reward for your efforts.
Congratulations! You've received a special reward. Good luck in your next fight on the battleground!
Thank you for helping us discover our true leader. \r\rAnd take this reward for teaching that trickster a lesson.\r\rI know I said I'd stay impartial but it serves that faker right!
I'm so sad to see what happened to you on the snowfield. Maybe this will make you feel better.
The Adventure Expedition is sending you the attached gift. Good luck in your next adventure.
Hi! I'm Casilyn, and I'm an apprentice witch. \r\rTo celebrate Valentine's Day, I'm sending out chocolate I made myself. I hope you like it!\r\rHappy Valentine's Day!
Hello! I'm Emima.\r\rI'm sending out Valentine's Day chocolate. It's sweet and delectable—you should try it! Happy Valentine's Day!

Hi there. I'm Keslyn. All the apprentice witches have to send out chocolate. I really don't want to, but...here you go, I guess. \r\rIf anyone asks, you have to say I sent you some chocolate. Leave out the part where I didn't want to.
You got my chocolate! Congrats! \r\rMy name is Beryn. I am an apprentice witch studying at the Eldritch Academy. Try the chocolate! Try it right now! I worked so hard on it!

Hi, I'm Drusla! I'm the Eldritch Academy's 17th postmaster. \r\rWith Valentine's Day approaching, the post office is overloaded with love letters from witches. I have one here for you. \r\rHappy Valentine's Day!
Roses are red, violets are blue, \r\rI made all this chocolate just for you! \r\rI hope you like it! They say it's the best in the castle this year.
Valentine's Day reminds me of being a kid—so much happiness out on the schoolyard! \r\rI hope my gift brings you a happy memory from your past. \r\r—Wheelow
Candy! From magic! Candy magic! Magic candy! I made it! I made the magical candy magic of magicness! \r\rI may have had too much of it... \r\r—Cordella

People are always ruining all my fun! I just wanted to have a little prank and everyone jumps up to stop me. \r\rWhat's wrong with a little frog and bat candy? Honestly? \r\rOh well. Happy Valentine's Day, anyway.
Valentine's Day is coming! You should try some of this candy I made! \r\rAnd don't worry about the fact that they came from the Eldritch Academy. I tested them myself!
This is a love letter delivered by the Mahagi Store. We provide only the best letters customized with customer-selected romantic messages.
This is a love letter sent by the Kyenryn Store. Pay attention to the whispers of love for Valentine's Day that are felt in romantic verse and elegant fonts.

Valentine's Day is here! \r\rLove and romance are great, but this year we have an even better gift. It's a very special gold card. I wanted to share my good luck with all of you. I wish you the greatest happiness!
Congratulations on getting a chance to taste the very first batch of chocolate made by the best witch of the Eldritch Academy. \r\rThat's me, by the way. \r\rHappy Valentine's Day!
Dear singles who buy into the marketing hype: \r\rEveryone is born alone. Chocolate and candies won't make you happy. Wake up and stop wasting money on this pointless holiday.

I've delivered four letters from those love-sick witches to you today. \r\rIs that too much? Is that enough? \r\rI won't be responsible for someone bursting from too much love. I'll give you some time to cool down, and maybe tomorrow I'll deliver some more. \r\rHappy Valentine's Day!

To celebrate Thanksgiving, we're giving out free comfort food made with the best ingredients. \r\rJust log in to the system and wait a while, and we'll send you your comfort food along with a small gift. Thank you.
We hope you enjoy your comfort food! \r\rWe'd also like you to enjoy this small gift made especially for you!
Oh no! We've run out of ingredients for comfort food! \r\rWe have another delivery of ingredients coming in the morning, though. Check back tomorrow for more comfort food!
Hello! I'm Blue.\n\nEvent reward mail will be delivered once an hour, 5 times a day.
Congratulations! You've reached a milestone in your level advancement in TERA. Here's a little something to help you reach your next milestone!
I have come to expect your bravery in every battle across the land. Your are the pride of Helkan Special Forces. Here is something to make your duty easier.
Greetings! We've prepared a special box to help your growth. Hope this supply box helps.
Greetings! We have prepared a special box full of Kaia's blessings to help you settle into your new server.
Event Buff for PC Cafe users
[Argon Queen] Event buff for PC Cafe users
The race for levels on Akeron
Congratulations! You have reached level 61! We are looking forward to your new achievements!
Congratulations! You have reached level 62! We are looking forward to your new achievements!
Congratulations! You have reached level 63! We are looking forward to your new achievements!
Congratulations! You have reached level 64! We are looking forward to your new achievements!
Congratulations! You have reached level 65! We are looking forward to your new achievements!
